hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: XAP_VERSION
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: The maven version of this xap release

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH_NAME
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: The source branch for this xap-release

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -f /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export BRANCH=$BRANCH_NAME" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export RELEASE_VERSION=$FINAL_VERSION" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export XAP_VERSION=$XAP_VERSION" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export MILESTONE=$MILESTONE" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export BUILD_NUMBER=$FINAL_BUILD_NUMBER" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export NEWMAN_TAGS=$NEWMAN_TAGS" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export TAG_NAME=$TAG_NAME" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export OVERRIDE_EXISTING_TAG=$OVERRIDE_EXISTING_TAG" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export DEPLOY_ARTIFACTS=$DEPLOY_ARTIFACTS" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export PERFORM_FULL_M2_CLEAN=$PERFORM_FULL_M2_CLEAN" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh echo "export WORKSPACE=$XAP_WORKSPACE" >> /home/jenkins/xap_scripts/release-xap-setenv.sh
